projects.title: Smart Home IoT System
projects.short_description: Designed and implemented a comprehensive IoT system for home automation using ESP32 microcontrollers and various sensors.
projects.long_description: A complete home automation solution that integrates multiple sensors and actuators through a centralized control system. Features real-time temperature monitoring, automated lighting control, smart door locks, and energy consumption optimization.

projects.title: PCB Design for Audio Amplifier
projects.short_description: Created a custom PCB design for a high-fidelity audio amplifier with advanced filtering and power management.
projects.long_description: High-fidelity audio amplifier PCB design with Class AB topology, delivering 50W RMS per channel with minimal distortion. Features advanced filtering circuits, thermal management, and protection systems.

projects.title: Solar Panel Monitoring System
projects.short_description: Developed a real-time monitoring system for solar panels with data logging and performance analytics.
projects.long_description: Real-time solar panel monitoring system with data logging, performance analytics, and predictive maintenance. Tracks energy production, efficiency metrics, and environmental conditions for optimal performance.

projects.title: Gesture Control Robot
projects.short_description: Built a robot that responds to hand gestures using computer vision and Arduino-based motor control.
projects.long_description: Interactive robot that responds to hand gestures using computer vision and Arduino-based motor control. Features real-time gesture recognition, smooth motor control, and obstacle avoidance capabilities.

projects.title: Wireless Sensor Network
projects.short_description: Implemented a mesh network of wireless sensors for environmental monitoring in remote locations.
projects.long_description: Mesh network of wireless sensors for environmental monitoring in remote locations. Features low-power design, long-range communication, and robust data transmission for harsh environments.

projects.title: Digital Signal Processing Module
projects.short_description: Designed a DSP module for real-time audio processing with FPGA implementation and custom algorithms.
projects.long_description: Digital Signal Processing module for real-time audio processing with FPGA implementation. Features custom DSP algorithms, low-latency processing, and configurable filter banks for various audio applications.
